top_level_symbols.name: LineTag
top_level_symbols.doc: Structured label for per-paragraph line classification.

top_level_symbols.name: InlineTag
top_level_symbols.doc: Inline structural token span inside a non-system paragraph.

top_level_symbols.name: NormalizeReport
top_level_symbols.doc: Summary of normalization actions and counts for one chapter.

top_level_symbols.name: ChapterNormalizer
top_level_symbols.doc: Normalize and structurally tag a chapter object.

top_level_symbols.name: normalize_chapter_text
top_level_symbols.doc: Backwards-compatible helper: normalize a chapter dict with defaults. This wrapper preserves the previous functional API you may have used.
